rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with high ceilings and raw concrete textures, adhering to Brutalist design.
Designed with a private bathroom en-suite, large windows for natural light and ventilation, placed in the north-east as per Vastu guidelines.
Adjacent to bedroom 1 with a private balcony facing east, ensuring good sunlight and ventilation.
Located near the central living area for easy access; designed with simplicity in mind.
Sits adjacent to Bedroom 3, maintaining privacy and ample natural light.
A compact space for guests, designed with minimalistic features following Brutalist aesthetics.
An expansive dining room placed adjacent to the kitchen for a functional flow. Windows oriented towards the south-west as per Vastu.
A modern, functional kitchen with an open layout, incorporating Brutalist elements and proper ventilation aligned to north-west Vastu norms.
A central living area designed for comfort and social gatherings, with large windows facing east for optimal natural lighting as per Vastu.
A dedicated home office space, isolated to ensure minimal distractions, with a window facing north-west for clarity and focus as per Vastu.
A utility room integrated within the living space, ensuring easy access to clothing storage while maintaining a streamlined design.
